citations.narrative:
On August 1, 2024 a male zebra was scheduled to be shipped from the facility and was moved from its enclosure to a
stall in the horse barn. At some point thereafter the zebra escaped from the stall and traveled to the adjacent neighbors
yard. The animal then returned back to the facility unharmed. The facility must ensure that all enclosures, permanent or
temporary, must securely contain the animals to protect them from potential injury.

The shelf inside of the coatimundi enclosure was found with a build up of debris consisting of a dark material and old food
waste. This could harbor disease causing agents and negatively affect the health of the animal. Animal enclosures must
be cleaned as frequently as necessary in order to minimize disease hazards and ensure the health of the animals.
The facility corrected this issue at the time of inspection.
*********Corrected on 9/13/24
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a)  Repeat
   
Facilities, general. 
On August 1, 2024 a male zebra was scheduled to be shipped from the facility and was moved from its enclosure to a 
stall in the horse barn. At some point thereafter the zebra escaped from the stall and traveled to the adjacent neighbors 
yard. The animal then returned back to the facility unharmed. The facility must ensure that all enclosures, permanent or 
temporary, must securely contain the animals to protect them from potential injury. 
3.131(a) 
   
Sanitation. 
The shelf inside of the coatimundi enclosure was found with a build up of debris consisting of a dark material and old food 
waste. This could harbor disease causing agents and negatively affect the health of the animal. Animal enclosures must 
be cleaned as frequently as necessary in order to minimize disease hazards and ensure the health of the animals.  
The facility corrected this issue at the time of inspection. 
*********Corrected on 9/13/24 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
